ingredients.ingredient: 3 large Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored, and quartered

cookingTips: Caramelize the sugar and butter evenly before adding apples for the signature golden bottom
Arrange apple quarters in a circular pattern for even cooking and attractive presentation
Invert the tarte onto a plate immediately after baking while the caramel is still warm
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This upside-down apple tart requires careful caramelization. Focus on even browning of the sugar-butter mixture before layering apples.
